messages.message:
actually, i’m not sure if this ^ explains the recent failures on aihub-sandbox

in this run (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14717/overview/e40baa3a-dfb4-4fb4-960d-232074eb49de/replay?att=1&pc=10305.308__network-calls&roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&runStatus=PASSED&runStatus=FAILED&runStatus=RUNNING&runStatus=CANCELLED&runStatus=ERRORED&runStatus=NOTESTS&runStatus=TIMEDOUT&ts=1729024097832.655), all the `/usage` calls finished, but the problem is that `GET /projects?proj_id=<proj_id>` took ~14s

and i’m able to reproduce this manually - in this instance, `GET /projects?proj_id=<proj_id>` took 31s :sob:
for the 31s call, the trace id is `444f92fd9dc8c997`, but i can’t find it in grafana :disappointed:
i can’t see any traces in jaeger for aihub-sandbox - maybe something is wrong with observability for aihub-sandbox?
have you tried changing the time filter?

1. my trace was from ~1 hour ago, so it should have been included in the filter, when i tried to view the trace ~40 min ago
2. i can’t see any traces in the “Search” tab :(
